marking.translation[0].definitions[0].de: things painted or written on something, especially something such as an aircraft, road, vehicle etc
marking.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The marking on the road is unclear.
strange markings on the walls of the cave
marking.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the coloured patterns and shapes on an animal’s fur, on leaves etc
marking.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: This dolphin is noted for its distinctive black and white markings.
the vivid markings of the angelfish
marking.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the activity of checking students’ written work
marking.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: I have to do a lot of marking tonight.
the setting and marking of exams
